author: flodamas
body:
#### PR description:

Update of the configuration of the PbPb skims in view of the 2024 HI run. The `ZMM` skim is replaced by the `ZMu` skimming code to avoid duplicates such that a unique skimmed dataset can be used for both Z boson physics analyses and muon tag-and-probe.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests passed successfully.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to 14_1_X for the HI run.
title: Update the PbPb skims for 2024 data taking
